name: Treat Thief
description:
The humans came over to your lands for a picnic and left without cleaning up properly! There are all kinds of treats left behind, which are of interest you, the curious little badger... The allures of sugary goods have not gone unnoticed by others though, the mischievous fairies have arrived and are also trying to get their part of the sweet sweet hoard! Dodge the fairies and collect as many treats as you can!

Gameplay features:
  • Collect treats and bring them back to your nest
  • You're on a timer, get more time by storing treats in your nest!
  • Don't get hit by the fairies, they will try to steal your treats!
  • Hide in a bush to escape the chase!
  • Can you get 100% of the treats?
Controls:

WASD - movement

SPACE - jump

ESC - pause

Created as a project of the Tampere University of Applied Sciences GameCamp 2021 by students. Feedback is very welcome!
